price: 52. Sow aniga kama fiicni midkani liita ee aan kareyn inuu caddeeyo hadalkiisa13; .
arabic: أَمۡ أَنَا۠ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي هُوَ مَهِينٞ وَلَا يَكَادُ يُبِينُ
footnotes: 13. Waxay ula jeedaan Nabi Muuse c.s. Taasina dhab bay ahayd ka hor inta aan Muuse laga dhigin Nabi, markii la soo diray isagoo Nabi ah wuxuu Allaah ka furay guntinta carrabkiisa oo ka dhigay cod kar hadal cad.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: am anā khayrun min hādhā alladhī huwa mahīnun walā yakādu yubīnu
